typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_debtoreligibilityreviewstatusid as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_eligibilitystatusid as string,
		ntt_moratoriumid as string,
		ntt_creditornotes as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		owninguser as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_debtoreligibilityreviewid as string,
		ntt_creditorid as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_moneyadvisernotes as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTDebtorEligibilityReviewId as string,
		strNTTDebtorEligibilityReviewStatusId as string,
		strNTTMoratoriumId as string,
		strNTTEligibilityStatusId as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidation
sourceValidation select(mapColumn(
		owningbusinessunit,
		ntt_debtoreligibilityreviewstatusid,
		ntt_name,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		createdby,
		ntt_eligibilitystatusid,
		ntt_moratoriumid,
		ntt_creditornotes,
		ownerid,
		modifiedon,
		owninguser,
		modifiedby,
		ntt_debtoreligibilityreviewid,
		ntt_creditorid,
		createdon,
		ntt_moneyadvisernotes,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		strNTTDebtorEligibilityReviewId,
		strNTTDebtorEligibilityReviewStatusId,
		strNTTMoratoriumId,
		strNTTEligibilityStatusId,
		blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
FilterValidation alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSink
SelectColumns filter(strNTTDebtorEligibilityReviewId != 'missing' || !isNull(ntt_debtoreligibilityreviewid)) ~> FilterValidation
AlterRowSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/debtors/debtoreligibilityreview',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTDebtorEligibilityReviewId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkODS
